remarks.para: Use the attribute to turn off the standard array wrapper element when you want to emit an unbounded number of identical elements either inside the <soap:Header> directly or inside the first and only child of <soap:Header> without the default wrapper element for array types.

can be applied only to members of an array type. If specified, the and are used as the name and namespace of the element of each array item. If not specified, the array item elements are named using the same convention used for naming non-repeating body parts. For more information, see and .
